outputs.output_descr: Consolidation of Plan governance and sustainability strategies. Training and capacitation in sensibilization for personnel of public institutions, updating of technical specialties on the topic of employability of people with disabilities. Communication and awareness campaign on training and hiring services for PwD. Design and promotion of a toolkit por employers. Expand the network of inclusive companies in rural areas, such  as the Brunca or Chorotega regions.

project_descr: National Plan for Labor Inclusion of People with Disabbilities
project_title: NATIONAL PLAN  LABOR INCLUSION PERSONS W/ DISABILITIES
